\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\&\&\&\& X \\
	M \& C \&\& {\mathrm{cok}(i)} \& P \\
	M \& {M_C} \&\& {M_B}
	\arrow[dashed, from=1-5, to=2-2]
	\arrow[from=1-5, to=2-4]
	\arrow[dashed, from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow["i", from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-2, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=3-2]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow[dashed, from=2-5, to=3-2]
	\arrow[dashed, from=2-5, to=3-4]
	\arrow[from=3-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow[two heads, from=3-2, to=3-4]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
